perturbation.original_text: WHEREAS, both Network Affiliate and NCM want to expand NCM's advertising "footprint" in the markets served by Network Affiliate;  and     WHEREAS, NCM and Network Affiliate want to enter into a strategic alliance under which NCM will provide the Service to Network  Affiliate, and Network Affiliate will accept and display the Service in its theatres, all on the terms set forth herein.
perturbation.changed_text: WHEREAS, both Network Affiliate and NCM want to expand NCM's advertising reach in the markets served by Network Affiliate;  and     WHEREAS, NCM and Network Affiliate want to enter into a strategic alliance under which NCM will provide the Service to Network  Affiliate, and Network Affiliate will accept and display the Service in its cinemas, all on the terms set forth herein.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'footprint' and 'reach' and 'theatres' and 'cinemas' are used interchangeably without defining them. This creates ambiguity as to the scope of NCM's advertising ambitions and whether the agreement covers all Network Affiliate's venues or only a subset.

perturbation.original_text: "Theatres" means the individual Network Affiliate theatres listed on Exhibit B, as such list may be modified from time to time.     "Traditional Content Program" means advertising and other promotional content which is displayed on 35 mm film before Showtime.
perturbation.changed_text: "Theatres" means the individual Network Affiliate cinemas listed on Exhibit B, as such list may be modified from time to time.     "Traditional Content Program" means advertising and other promotional content which is displayed on 35 mm film before Showtime.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'theatres' and 'cinemas' are used interchangeably in the definition section without clear guidelines, which makes it unclear if 'Theatres' only refer to specific locations or all venues owned by Network Affiliate.
